channel.title: 软餐 - 新鲜软件资讯
channel.description: 软餐 - 新鲜软件资讯 - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: 德国高速铁路还在用古老的 Windows 3.11
item.description:
软餐获悉，由西门子交通发布的一则招聘广告（已删除）显示，其客户德国铁路公司（DB）内部仍在使用已有 30 年历史的 Windows for Workgroups 3.11 系统。该系统发布于 1992 年 10 月。西门子正为德国铁路寻找一位了解传统操作系统的系统管理员，尤其是 Windows 3.11 for Workgroups。其职责是处理该系统的更新和维护。这则招聘信息还显示，列车驾驶室的显示系统基于 Windows 3.11 for Workgroups 运行，该系统实时向驾驶员显示所有重要的技术数据。据悉，该系统最有可能用于旧的 ICE 1 和 ICE2 高速城际快车。西门子交通证实了招聘信息的真实性，并解释说火车和铁路基础设施的使用寿命为 30 年或更长时间。该公司向公众保证，其客户 「继续安全地使用业内久经考验的遗留系统」，并且西门子为整个生命周期提供支持和维护。该公司还补充说，更新的系统是使用当前可用的软件产品开发的，甚至会用到人工智能。

A recruitment advertisement (now deleted) released by Siemens Mobility has revealed that their client, Deutsche Bahn (DB), is still using the 30-year-old Windows for Workgroups 3.11 system internally. This system was released in October 1992. Siemens is actively seeking a system administrator with knowledge of traditional operating systems, particularly Windows 3.11 for Workgroups, to handle updates and maintenance of this system for Deutsche Bahn. The job description also states that the display systems in train cabins run on Windows 3.11 for Workgroups, providing real-time display of all critical technical data to the train drivers. It is reported that this system is most likely used for the older ICE 1 and ICE 2 high-speed intercity trains. Siemens Mobility has confirmed the authenticity of the recruitment information, explaining that the lifespan of trains and railway infrastructure is typically 30 years or longer. The company assures the public that their clients continue to use industry-proven legacy systems safely, and Siemens provides support and maintenance throughout the entire lifecycle. The company also adds that the updated systems are developed using currently available software products and may even incorporate artificial intelligence.

item.title: Google 搜索停止提供网页快照
item.description:
软餐获悉，Google 已从搜索结果中删除了网页快照选项。Google 员工 Danny Sullivan 确认，网页缓存功能不再显示在 Google 搜索结果中。以前该选项位于搜索结果条目右侧的菜单中，用户可借助该选项访问 Google 缓存网页的早期索引版本。缓存功能于几年前引入，它是网络原因导致原始网页无法加载时的替代选择，但现在网络状况已有了很大改善。因此，Google 决定停止提供该功能。过去几个月来，Google 一直在逐渐删除该功能。Google 建议希望查看网站缓存版本的用户使用 Google Search Console。用户还可使用 Wayback Machine 等服务。

Google has removed the option for webpage snapshots from its search results. Google employee Danny Sullivan confirmed that the webpage cache functionality is no longer displayed in Google search results. Previously, this option was located in the menu on the right side of the search result entry, allowing users to access earlier indexed versions of webpages through Google’s cache. Google now considers this feature irrelevant. The cache functionality was introduced several years ago as an alternative when the original webpage couldn’t load due to network issues. However, with significant improvements in network conditions, Google has decided to discontinue this feature. Over the past few months, Google has been gradually removing this functionality. Google advises users who wish to view cached versions of websites to use the Google Search Console. Users can also utilize services like the Wayback Machine.

item.title: [清单]2024 年 1 月浏览器市场份额公布
item.description:
软餐获悉，Statcounter 发布了 2024 年 1 月的浏览器份额报告。数据显示，桌面方面，谷歌的 Chrome 浏览器地位稳固，占有 64.84% 的份额，微跌 0.39%；第二位的 Microsoft Edge 浏览器表现亮眼，增长 1.01 %，拿到 12.96% 的份额。移动浏览器领域格局相对更加稳定，各家涨跌变化均未超过 0.50%。

2024 年 1 月，桌面浏览器市场份额：

  1. Google Chrome – 64.84% (-0.39 points)
  2. Microsoft Edge – 12.96% (+1.01 points)
  3. Apple Safari – 8.83 (-0.13 points)
  4. Mozilla Firefox – 7.57% (-0.05 points)
  5. Opera – 3.23% (-0.57 points)

2024 年 1 月，移动浏览器市场份额：

  1. Google Chrome – 64.74% (-0.19 points)
  2. Apple Safari – 25.07% (+0.36 points)
  3. Samsung Internet – 4.39% (-0.09 points)
  4. Opera – 2.15% (-0.12 points)
  5. UC Browser – 1.36% (-0.12 points)

item.title: [图] OneDrive 网盘下月迎来全新界面
item.description:
软餐获悉，微软终于改版了 OneDrive 网盘的消费者版本。新界面将于 2 月份推送给所有用户。微软称，新界面允许用户更快地访问自己的文件，并且还将有一些新功能。新界面更加简洁，例如：微软已将 「新建」 和 「上传」 按钮合并为 「新增」 按钮；可以按文件类型进行过滤，例如 Word、Excel 或 PDF 文件；新增了 「按人员浏览文件」 选项，可查看每个人共享了哪些文件等。去年，微软已经为 OneDrive 的商业版本发布了类似的 UI 更改。

Microsoft has finally revamped the consumer version of its OneDrive cloud storage. The new interface will be rolled out to all users in February. Microsoft states that the new interface allows users to access their files faster and introduces several new features. The new interface is more streamlined, for example, Microsoft has combined the 「New」 and 「Upload」 buttons into a single 「Add」 button. Users can also filter files by type, such as Word, Excel, or PDF files. Additionally, there is a new option to 「Browse files by people」 which allows users to see which files are shared by each person. Similar UI changes were introduced last year for the business version of OneDrive by Microsoft.

item.title: 微软正为 Edge 浏览器安卓版开发扩展功能
item.description:
软餐获悉，微软被发现正为 Edge 浏览器安卓版开发扩展功能。开发者 Leopeva64 分享的截屏显示，在 Microsoft Edge 的 Canary 测试版中，浏览器菜单中已出现扩展程序的选项菜单。微软公司尚未对该消息发表回应。Firefox 安卓版已于去年底全面支持扩展功能。观察人士认为，随着欧盟《数字市场法案》（DMA）的生效，苹果将允许在 iOS 上使用基于其他浏览器引擎的浏览器，微软等浏览器厂商也将在 iOS 平台上有所作为。

Microsoft has been discovered to be developing extension functionality for the Android version of its Edge browser. A screenshot shared by developer Leopeva64 shows that the options menu for browser extensions has appeared in the browser menu of the Canary test version of Microsoft Edge. Microsoft has not yet responded to this news. Observers believe that with the enforcement of the EU’s Digital Markets Act (DMA), Apple will allow browsers based on other browser engines to be used on iOS, and browser vendors like Microsoft will also make moves on the iOS platform.
